product_name: Stansport Propane Lantern with Amber Glass - 2011 Closeout
long_description: When the sun goes down on your campsite, the Stansport Propane Lantern with amber glass shines a soft, adjustable light for evening gatherings. Heat resistant amber glass globe attracts fewer bugs than a bright white light (clear globe). Features two silk mantles; lantern is adjustable from bright to dim. On/off control knob and built in pressure regulator provide superior performance in all weather conditions. Tip-resistant plastic base with feet keeps lantern stable when set on a table or the ground. Steel carrying/hanging handle; for outdoor use only. Uses 16.4-oz. propane cylinder, not included. Due to flammable-item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores. Closeout.
short_description: When the sun goes down on your campsite, the Stansport Propane Lantern with amber glass shines a soft, adjustable light for evening gatherings.
